original_text: And these are the kings of the land whom Joshua and the people of Israel defeated on the west side of the Jordan, from Baal-gad in the Valley of Lebanon to Mount Halak, that rises toward Seir (and Joshua gave their land to the tribes of Israel as a possession according to their allotments,
korean_text: 여호수아와 이스라엘 자손이 요단 이편 곧 서쪽 레바논 골짜기의 바알갓에서부터 세일로 올라가는 곳 할락 산까지 쳐서 멸한 그 땅의 왕들은 이러하니라 (그 땅을 여호수아가 이스라엘의 지파들에게 구분에 따라 소유로 주었으니

sentences.original_text: And these are the kings of the land
whom Joshua and the people of Israel defeated
on the west side of the Jordan
from Baal-gad in the Valley of Lebanon
(and Joshua gave their land to the tribes of Israel
as a possession according to their allotments,
